reading_list.title: The Mismeasure of Man
reading_list.notes: Classic critique of IQ testing and biological determinism

reading_list.title: Statistical Theories of Mental Test Scores
reading_list.notes: Foundation of Classical Test Theory - shows probabilistic basis

reading_list.title: Psychometric Theory
reading_list.notes: Standard reference on reliability and SEM

reading_list.title: The Bell Curve Wars
reading_list.notes: Collection of critical responses to Herrnstein & Murray

reading_list.title: Intelligence: Knowns and Unknowns
reading_list.authors: Neisser, U., et al. (APA Task Force)
reading_list.notes: APA report acknowledging test limitations and SEM
